edu.vt.middleware.password
Class PasswordChecker

java.lang.Object
  edu.vt.middleware.password.PasswordChecker

public final class PasswordChecker
extends java.lang.Object

PasswordChecker contains methods for setting pasword rules and then determining if a password meets the requirements of all the rules.

Version:
$Revision: 1253 $ $Date: 2010-04-20 10:54:19 -0400 (Tue, 20 Apr 2010) $
Author:
Middleware Services

Method Detail

addPasswordRule

public void addPasswordRule(PasswordRule rule)
This will add a new rule to the PasswordChecker.

Parameters:
rule - PasswordRule to add

removePasswordRule

public void removePasswordRule(PasswordRule rule)
This will remove a rule from the PasswordChecker. This method does nothing if the supplied rule does not exist.

Parameters:
rule - PasswordRule to remove

getPasswordRules

public java.util.List<PasswordRule> getPasswordRules()
This will return all the rules currently being used by this PasswordChecker.

Returns:
List of rules

checkPassword

public boolean checkPassword(Password password)
                      throws PasswordException
This will check the supplied password against the rules that have been added to this PasswordChecker.

Parameters:
password - Password to check
Returns:
boolean - whether the supplied password met the requirements of all rules
Throws:
PasswordException - if the supplied password does not meet all requirements of all rules

main

public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
                 throws java.lang.Exception
This provides command line access to a PasswordChecker.

Parameters:
args - String[]
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - if an error occurs
